text: pheap ameasa ban kaetmean champoh puokke tohbeicha puok ke now tinea kadaoy leuklengte puok del mean kechch promoprieng cheamuoy a l laoh ning cheamuoy anak ai sla m bonnaoh . haey puokke ban tralbmokvinh daoy meankar khoengosambea pi a l laoh haey puokke trauv ban ttuolorng nouv pheap krakhsaat . noh ku daoysaarte puokke ban brachheang nung banda phosdo tang robsa a l laoh ning ban samleab na pi cheachraen daoy a you tde thmr . noh ku daoysaarte avei del puokke ban br pru td batolmeusa ning ban bampean leu batobanhchea robsa yeung
